fields.System.Title: Master Data Cleanup features - Parent merge (the user with special role)
fields.Microsoft.VSTS.TCM.Steps:
<steps id="0" last="9"><step type="ValidateStep" id="2"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><DIV><P><B><U>[PRECONDITION]</U></B> 1. An Internal user with "master Data Cleanup Special Admin" portal role is logged in.
2. The following Supplier Parent exists in the system:
- all the Vendor Codes of the Parent are in the Vendor Code table with InSnc=0;
- all the Vendor Codes of the Parent are not found in the new “NonUtasVendorsInSnc” table;
3. Supplier Parent which has all the Vendor Codes of the Parent with InSnc=1;</P></DIV></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P></P></DIV></parameterizedString></step><step type="ValidateStep" id="3"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><DIV><P>1.Navigate to Supplier Parent page (Precondition step 2).</P></DIV></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>1.The 'Merge' button is enabled.</P></DIV></parameterizedString></step><step type="ValidateStep" id="4"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><DIV><P>1.Click on 'Merge' button.</P></DIV></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>1.Popup, that  allows to select a Parent, appears.</P></DIV></parameterizedString></step><step type="ValidateStep" id="5"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><DIV><P>1.Select Parent</P></DIV></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>1.Confirmation dialog appears.</P></DIV></parameterizedString></step><step type="ValidateStep" id="6"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><DIV><P>1.Click on 'Confirm' button.</P></DIV></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>1.Parents are merged. 
MERGING LOGIC:

 -  when merging parents all locations and data from the original parent is moved to a new Parent (locations and vendor codes).
- Parent information (name, code) is not moved.
- Old Parent is Deleted from the database.

(The "Merge" action is only allowed for a Parent if all the Vendor Codes of the Parent are:

 -   in the Vendor Code table with InSnc=0
 -   not found in the new “NonUtasVendorsInSnc” table)</P></DIV></parameterizedString></step><step type="ValidateStep" id="7"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><DIV><P>1.Navigate to Supplier Parent page (Precondition step 3) - case when situation doesn't satisfy the rules.
2.Click on 'Merge' button.</P></DIV></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>1. Disabled "Merge" button is shown.
2. The Override form is shown after clicking on Merge button, explaining that Parent has VCs which are already in SNC,  but allows the user to optionally override the protection around the SNC vendor code(s).</P></DIV></parameterizedString></step><step type="ValidateStep" id="8"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><DIV><P>1. Fill in the form (in validation message).
2. Click on "Override the Protection & Save the Change".</P></DIV></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>1. The override form is submitted successfully.
2. An email notification is sent to all accounts with the Master Data Cleanup Special Admin role.</P></DIV></parameterizedString></step><step type="ValidateStep" id="9"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><DIV><P>1. Verify an email which is sent when Override done.</P></DIV></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>1. Subject: "Alert! Protection Override for Master Data has been used by [Name on account that did the change]"            
       ![](index.php?/attachments/get/9439) 
2. ![](index.php?/attachments/get/9440)

The body of an email: 
Dear [RecipientName],
This is to inform you that the Master Data Cleanup Special Admin permission was used to override the protection for the parenting of SNC Vendor Code(s).
Who did the change;
Vendor code(s) affected;
Previously associated with...;
Now associated with...;
Comment: I've confirmed today with Tanaya Krauss (UTAS) & Lisa Gross (PWA) that this change can be made in the Supplier Portal because the same parenting change has been done in the SNC instances of UTAS and PWA.

A copy of this notification has been sent to all accounts with the internal Master Data Cleanup Special Admin role.
Regards...
</P></DIV></parameterizedString></step></steps>
fields.System.Tags: RC_Regression_Portal; Smoke & Sanity; Smoke Portal; Sprint115; TestRail_Import
